alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Henderson; Macon; Southern Jackson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 6:43PM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Buncombe, Henderson, Macon, Southern Jackson, and Transylvania Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp.

area.areaDesc: Buncombe; Henderson; Macon; Southern Jackson; Transylvania
